name: Rogue Floopy Ship
description:
You are Rogue Floopy Ship. You score points by flying close to the ground, and even more points to fly close to objects. You have three lives to score as many points as you can! Real challenge is to complete the circle 

Be aware, don't collide with building and trees - they are rock solid !

Amazing 3-level

HOW TO PLAY : "A" / "D" arrow for movement
